archimate:BusinessProcess.name: BP - Exchange & Recommande
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
After exchanges (tchat 3.0), the prescriptor recommands the user by delivering a to do list (links to guides / doc on line) and/or a shopping list
To Do List : ordered list of actions/tasks (no notion of timeline) or links to tuto
Shopping list : List of products, 1 to N, (no notion of availibility / stock)
